name: Messy Crossings
description:
Simple arcade style timing/reaction game. 
Face Uncertainty.
Cross the Messy Crossings.
Get the Highest of High-Scores.

Inspired by a pedestrian crossing light in Suceva, Romania. Wanted to put him in something since I saw him and now finally Crossing guy gets his very own game.

How to Play:

  • This is a two button game
    • Press 'R' for Red
    • Press 'G' for Green
  • There are 3 sets of traffic lights
  • It is uncertain which traffic lights you will toggle
  • Toggle the traffic lights to safely get the crossers across the crossings
  • Keep crossing until all crossers perish (sorry crossers, it is your destiny)
  • Compete locally with your friends/family for the High-Score

Developed during Pirate Jam 2020
